author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This PR is conglomerate of #15978 + fixes in EMTF emulator to rid of duplicate tracks.

Once #15978 merged, this PR will become simple (the last one commit, 2 files changed).

The fix in EMTF should resolve the problem of higher rates in emulated multi-muon triggers compared to data. The problem appeared after switched to 2nd arriving LCT in the emulator.
- pending blessing in L1T DPG.
title: Pr80x fix duplicate tracks EMTF on top  l1t-tsg-v9.2-post-O2O-pr
